snippet.title: No More Snow - GamePlay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Demo and Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244970/No_More_Snow/?utm_source=youtube

You control Santa Claus as he fights against Krampus and his mischievous minions. The game features 8 unique levels, an army of monsters, and challenging boss fights. Can you save Christmas and bring peace to the North Pole?
